summary: David and his wife Gilda transform their beautiful villa in a brothel, which are home to several characters. Odile, the daughter of a woman tortured by mercenaries, meets in the villa one ... See full summary »
cast: Alain Cuny|Juliette Mayniel|Luciano Salce|Stefania Casini|José Quaglio|Silvia Dionisio|Jean Valmont|Ilona Staller|Consuelo Ferrara|Sonja Jeannine|Gabriella Lepori|Sergio Valentini|Ruth Anderson|Giovanna D'Albore|Anna Mallarini|Eros Buttaglieri|Maria Rosa La Fauci|Maurizio Streccioni|Libero Sansovini|Gianfranco Principi|Bruno Alias|Marina Pierro|Sofia Dionisio|Amedeo Salamon|Rossana Canghiari|Maria Tedeschi
title: I prosseneti
